data.meta_description: Fabulous day at the Grocery Innovations Canada conference today, where I had the chance to explore the latest industry innovations, network with fellow CPGâ€¦
data.text:
Exciting Update from IGA Supermarkets! In the relentless pursuit of delivering exceptional value to IGA shoppers, IGA Supermarkets is thrilled to announce an expansion of our IGA own brand expertise into new categories! As IGA continues to recognize the importance of supplier collaboration who share alignment around quality and innovation, IGA introduces a streamlined process for interested suppliers to submit their own brand capabilities directly to our private label team. RangeMe With over 1,000 stores proudly carrying IGA branded products, this presents an incredible opportunity for suppliers aiming to drive capacity, scale, and volume. Why partner with IGA? âœ… Established Presence: Join a network of over 1,000 stores nationwide. âœ… Quality Assurance: Align your brand with IGA's commitment to excellence. âœ… Innovation Hub: Explore new categories and bring your unique offerings to our shelves. âœ… Shopper-Focused: Connect with a loyal customer base seeking value and quality. Ready to take your brand to new heights? Submit your capabilities now and be part of the IGA Supermarkets success story! https://lnkd.in/edU4_8A2 See Resources>Suppliers>Interested on bottom of page. #IGASupermarkets #PrivateLabel #SupplierPartnership #Innovation #QualityProducts #RetailSuccess

2024, itâ€™s all about meeting consumers where they are. As their needs and preferences evolve, itâ€™s our job as marketers to stay one step ahead. I had the privilege of connecting with Dianna Dilworth Christe from Brand Innovators to share a few CPG predictions for the new year, including addressing the growing need for value with unique propositions, Drive Thru as a sustained trend led by Gen Z, and more brands investing in platforms that prioritize seamless mobile ordering and delivery. The way foodies discover restaurants and products has shifted drastically and PepsiCo Foodservice is creating new opportunities to meet consumers where they are, elevating our brands and customers along the way. Read more 2024 CPG predictions here: https://lnkd.in/gVaEujDA and a special thanks to the PepsiCo insights team for enabling us to move at the speed of culture so we can continue to create impactful work. #PepsiCoProud #CPG #2024trends

Leveraging Carrefour's unparalleled data lake and fostering synergies between our Data Partnerships and Customer Success Manager teams. ğŸ“Š Data is not just our tool, it's our strategy. It empowers us to compare brand performance meticulously, analyze promotional effectiveness with precision, and delve deep into purchasing behaviors. This rich insight enables us to make informed decisions, ensuring agility in the face of retail's dynamic challenges. ğŸ¤Together, Danone and Carrefour are not just sharing data; we're crafting a shared vision that paves the way for groundbreaking innovations and a reimagined approach to category management. ğŸ™ thanks to the Danone teams for their dedication and trust in this partnership. For #FMCG manufacturers, the Spanish #FoodService market has emerged as a critical arena in recent years, especially for those primarily entrenched in the retail sector. Establishing a foothold in the #HORECA market requires a nuanced approach. Here's why: ğŸ’¡ Diverse clientele, varied strategies: with a broad spectrum of clients, the food service market demands tailored strategies. ğŸ’¡ New perspectives needed: a fresh, specific approach is imperative, and new methodologies are crucial for making significant strides in the hospitality channel. ğŸ’¡ Strategic focus: thorough market analysis, including competitor assessments and segment feasibility, players lay the groundwork for success. ğŸ’¡ Defining target goals: once opportunities are identified, it's vital to define precise target pictures (product offerings, pricing strategies, branding efforts...). Explore further insights in our last article and reach out for assistance in refining your retail strategy: â¡ï¸ https://lnkd.in/dgBwicVr #RolandBerger Fernando LÃ³pez de los Mozos

This initiative by IMAGES RetailME celebrates the journeys of some of the leading names in MENA's Food & Grocery retail sector. ğ€ğ›ğ¨ğ®ğ­ ğ­ğ¡ğ ğğ¨ğ¨ğ¤: The Food & Grocery Retail industry in the MENA region is undergoing significant changes, driven by evolving consumer behavior and digital advancements. The market is also seeing an increase in diverse products and categories, adding depth to store shelves. The Food Business Forum, held on June 6, 2024, brought together top industry players from hypermarkets, supermarkets, convenience stores, and specialty retailers, creating the perfect platform to unveil our yearbook. This book features the vision and success stories of the region's premier grocery chains and outlets. ğ…ğğšğ­ğ®ğ«ğğ ğ¢ğ§ ğ­ğ¡ğ ğğ¨ğ¨ğ¤: Ahmed Galal Ismail, CEO, Majid Al Futtaim ğ‡ğ¨ğ¥ğğ¢ğ§ğ  Majid Al Futtaim owns the exclusive rights to operate Carrefour in 14 markets across the Middle East, Africa, and Asia, under its distinct logo and name since 1995. To meet the growing needs of its diverse customer base and communities, Carrefour offers omnichannel customer experiences tailored to the needs of the modern consumer. Through its innovative physical and digital customer services, Carrefour provides access to an unrivaled choice of quality products at unbeatable value for the customers it serves daily. Find out more about the Grocery Pioneer in the Food & Grocery Retail Yearbook. Click here to get your copy: https://lnkd.in/ddv_RJb4 #foodandgrocery #grocerychain #FoodBusinessForum #CEO #groceryindustry

But that's not all â€“ let's take a closer look at the landscape: ğŸ” While some faced challenges, like Delhaize's minor dip of 4% in Cora's chocolate category during S1 2023 compared to S1 2022, which has sparked a passionate pursuit of revival. Likewise, Mars Romania encountered a cosmic challenge, experiencing a 5% slide in the same period, igniting a call for innovation amid the stars. Are you as curious as I am about Mondelez's performance in S2 2023? ğŸ¤” Will they maintain the impressive growth achieved in the first semester? The anticipation is building, and I can't wait to see how the story unfolds.
